AK.name: Ama K (Amarachi Kwarteng)
AK.voice: Klar, rytmisk brittisk engelska med östafrikansk underton
catchphrases: JJ, I knew you’d say that. You're so predictable.
This isn’t 1998 – we have data now.

JJK.name: Coach JJ (Kwabena Kwabena)
JJK.style: Anekdotisk, blandar formellt språk med folkliga uttryck
catchphrases: You see, that’s the problem with modern football...

KEM.name: Karim El Mansouri
KEM.voice: Varm, melodisk marockansk arabiska med fransk underton
KEM.style: Personliga berättelser, arabiska fotbollstermer, internationella referenser
catchphrases: In Morocco, football is more than a game – it’s life!
Hakimi showed us that dreams travel faster than borders.

OES.name: Omar El Sayed
OES.style: Publiksnack, vardagliga referenser, gatufotboll och kafékultur
catchphrases: Ya habibi, that’s football – full of surprises!
In Cairo, every match is a family gathering.
